name: Bang-a-Rama
description:
The game is a combination of spaceshooter and bullethell type game. Enemies become harder as the game goes on. Progress is based on waves of enemies. Can be played with keyboard and mouse or with Playstation 2/3 controller. XBox 360 controller support is being added. Game will get multiple updates and much more content.

Beware! The game is nowhere close being complete! It's pretty much a shell still. Support me by buying this game and I assure you that there will be updates and added features soon.
